segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching so high to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the jar that he doesn’t even realize how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just polishing that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting everywhere, but they don’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before someone slips on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is chaotic, but the kids seem to be having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
